\(P(A|B)=\frac{P(B|A)\times P(A)}{P(B)}\)

\[\begin{align}\int (\sin^4 x)dx &= \int (\sin^2 x)^2dx\\&=\int (\frac{1- \cos 2x}{2})^2dx\\&=\frac{1}{4}\int(1+\cos^2 2x-2\cos 2x)dx\\&=\frac{1}{4}\int(1+(\frac{1+\cos 4x}{2})-2\cos 2x)dx\\&=\frac{1}{4}(\frac{3}{2}x+\frac{1}{8}\sin 4x-\sin 2x) \end{align}\]
